    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        public void addListener(java.lang.Runnable listener)
        Adds the given runnable as a listener that will be triggered when the authorization process is finished.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        listener - Runnable instance that will be registered as a listener.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Performs a cancel in the authorization process, which consists in stopping the waiting server.
        Specified by:
        cancel in interface IGoogleLogger

      • authorize

        private void authorize(java.lang.String code)
        Finalizes OAuth login by executing token request using the given code.
        Parameters:
        code - Code to use for retrieving the authorization token.

      • waitForCode

        private org.eclipse.core.runtime.IStatus waitForCode(org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
        Functional method that aims to act as an IJobFunction. This function wait for code to be received and starts token request once it is done.
        Parameters:
        monitor - Monitor to use for tracking login progress.
        Returns:
        Status.OK_STATUS

      • getURL

        public java.lang.String getURL()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a valid authorization URL that can be used for authorize this application to work with google API. A local server is started in background using jetty in order to receive validation token once user has validated his identity.
        Specified by:
        getURL in interface IGoogleLogger
        Returns:
        OAuth URL.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any error occurs while creating URL or starting receiver server.

      • createLogger

        public static IGoogleLogger createLogger(java.util.function.Consumer<Session> sessionConsumer)
                                  throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                                         java.io.IOException
        Creates and returns a valid IGoogleLogger instance.
        Returns:
        Created instance.
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - If any error occurs while creating the HTTP transport.
        java.io.IOException - If any error occurs while creating the HTTP transport, or reading the application secret.

      • getSecret

        private static com.google.api.client.googleapis.auth.oauth2.GoogleClientSecrets getSecret()
                                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Static tool method that retrieves google client secret instance from internal JSON file.
        Returns:
        GoogleClientSecrets instance created.
        Throws:
